metadata.title: Real Indian Villages Resilience Database - Research Based
metadata.description: Evidence-based mapping of documented Indian villages with verified resilience scores
metadata.methodology: 10-parameter resilience scoring framework based on documented achievements
metadata.coverage: 16 major states with documented success stories
metadata.data_source: Government reports, ministry publications, and field documentation

properties.name: Ralegan Siddhi
properties.major_achievement: Water table rose from 150+ feet to 15-20 feet through watershed development

sources.title: Anna Hazare's Ralegan Siddhi Model - Government of Maharashtra

properties.name: Hiware Bazar
properties.major_achievement: 294% groundwater level increase through scientific watershed management

sources.title: National Water Award 2019 - Hiware Bazar Case Study

methodology.data_collection: Government reports, ministry publications, academic research
methodology.update_frequency: Based on new government reports and field studies

90-100.description: Nationally recognized model villages with documented success stories

80-89.description: Award-winning villages with significant development achievements

70-79.description: Villages with documented progress in multiple development areas

60-69.description: Villages participating in major government development programs

50-59.description: Villages with basic infrastructure and development initiatives

quality_assurance.data_authenticity: All villages based on documented government reports and verified sources
quality_assurance.field_verification: Data from published case studies and official evaluations
quality_assurance.source_credibility: Government departments, ministries, and recognized institutions
quality_assurance.update_methodology: Regular updates based on new official documentation
